timeline.message: Merge branch 'wire-invalidator-2' of github.com:palantir/atlasdb into wire-invalidator-2

timeline.bodyText: I think it might be better if this one returns an invalidator that will throw an exception if invoked? This should only really happen in a DB-TimeLock, and if something is calling invalidation there that is a bug.
timeline.author: jeremyk-91
